name: Owned By
description:
LDJAM42: Owned By

Interested in experiencing a twisted view of the human mind? If so, you are in the right place.
Owned by is a visual game poem that depicts society's expectations of the individual. We sprinkled it with a few metaphors and a crapton of psychedelia.

CONTROLS: WASD or ARROW keys to move, SHIFT or SPACE to sprint / use ability, MOUSE to manage UI

Programming, Design: Sokka Toivola

Art, Design: Ekku Meronen

Note: Audio is a bit funky on web build
